General.Name: EVe Mobility Acquisition Corp
General.Description: EVe Mobility Acquisition Corp does not have significant operations. The company focuses on effectuating a merger, share exchange, asset acquisition, share purchase, reorganization, or other similar business combination with one or more businesses. It intends to focus on the automotive and mobility industry. The company was incorporated in 2021 and is based in Wilmington, Delaware.
General.Address: 4001 Kennett Pike, Wilmington, DE, United States, 19807
